channel.title: Quest tab help
channel.description:
I want to change quest tab, i wont know much look below :)
current /snipped
What i want:
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/jg3z8h.png[/img]
need help :)

item.title: Quest tab help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Flame_, post:4, topic:536129”]Just as a reference, no links can be shown in this board.
Also, you don’t need to know what his current tab looks like in order to edit the code in it.
His current tab looks something along the lines of:[im g]http://i55.tinypic.com/2uy3879.jpg[/img][/quote]

No but there is more than one 317 client out there, and there’s at least 10 popular versions of quest tab designs, and then at least 5x that in unpopular designs. So knowing what I’m working with is pretty important in this situation.

OP: Assuming you have the ‘typical’ quest tab. You can use the array below to clear the entire tab (just call it in the init method for logging in). If all the id’s don’t clear, you want to make a command to cycle through a large amount of the id’s to see what the ids are.

public int[] questTab = { 13136,663,7332,7333,7334,7336,7383, 7339,7338,7340,7346,7341,7342,7337, 7343,7335,7344,7345,7347,7348, /*Members Quests*/ 682,673,12772,7352,12129,8438,18517,15847, 15487,12852,7354,7355,7356,8679, 7459,7357,14912,249,6024,191,15235, 15592,6987,15098,15352,18306,15499, 668,18684,6027,18157,15847,16128, 12836,16149,15841,7353,7358,17510, 7359,14169,10115,14604,7360,12282, 13577,12839,7361,11857,7362,7363, 7364,10135,4508,11907,7365,7366, 7367,13389,7368,11132,7369,12389, 13974,7370,8137,7371,12345,7372, 8115,8576,12139,7373,7374,8969, 7375,7376,1740,3278,7378,6518, 7379,7380,7381,11858,9927,7349, 7350,7351,13356 };

Example usage:

for (int element2 : questTab) { sendFrame126("", element2); }

Read full topic
